name: Cargo Stock Report
query:
Select cargo_type as "Cargo Type::80",
	container_no as "Container No::120",
	container_type as "Container Type::80",
	mark as "Mark::80", 
	chasis_no as "Chasis No::100",
 	CASE WHEN loading_error = 1 THEN "ERROR" END as "Loading::80",
	CASE WHEN discharged_error = 1 THEN "ERROR" END as "Discharged::80",
	CASE WHEN export_error = 1 THEN "ERROR" END as "Export::80",
	in_stock AS "STOCK::40",
	qty as "QTY::40",
	yard_slot as "Yard Slot::90",
	yard_date as "Stock Date::80",
	container_size as "Container Size::90",
	CASE WHEN status = 'Stock Completed' THEN "Closed" END as "STATUS::70"
from `tabCargo Stock History`
